history.content:
Hello, I'm Omotara and as a researcher in the Berkeley Institute of Design lab at UC Berkeley, we are running a user study on a new virtual reality authoring interface.

If you might be interested in giving us 30min - 1 hour of your time tomorrow, September 9th, to come into our lab and try out our interface, we'd love to take your input. We usually reimburse for your time at a rate of a $25 amazon gift card per hour. Your participation can help us create the next generation of VR applications!

The user study materials will be cleaned and sanitized in between uses according to COVID-19 school, local, state, and federal guidelines. Please let me know if you have any questions at omotara.oloye@berkeley.edu.

If interested, fill out the form here!
history.subject: VR User Study
